update_client_lead:
You cannot update client lead. Need to create new lead for the desired client.

 Aap client ki lead update nahi kar sakte. New lead create karni hogi us client ke liye.
update_client_name:
You cannot update client name, email, primary phone numbern.However create new client or update client details, navigate to the 'client' section. Click the green '+' icon to add a new client. To update existing client information, click the profile icon under the 'Action' column, make the necessary changes, and click 'Submit.' The updated details will be reflected across all relevant sections.

 client name, email, primary phone number change nhi kr saktay lekin client ki details add/update karnay ke liye 'client' section mein jao. New client add karnay ke liye green '+' icon pe click karo. Agar existing client ki info update karni ho to 'Action' column mein profile icon pe click karo, required changes karo aur 'Submit' button dabao. Ye changes har section mein update ho jayein gi.

update_client_action_button:
The action button allows you to edit, delete, or view client details. If its not working without records, make sure at least one client is added first.

 Action button se aap client ki detail view, edit ya delete kar sakte ho. Agar ye kaam nahi kar raha to pehle ek client add karna zaroori hai.
update_client_profile:
To update client Profile details, navigate to the 'client' section. Click the green '+' icon to add a new client. To update existing client information, click the profile icon under the 'Action' column, make the necessary changes, and click 'Submit.' The updated details will be reflected across all relevant sections.

 client ki profile details update karnay ke liye 'client' section mein jao. New client add karnay ke liye green '+' icon pe click karo. Agar existing client ki info update karni ho to 'Action' column mein profile icon pe click karo, required changes karo aur 'Submit' button dabao. Ye changes har section mein update ho jayein gi.
add_client:
To add client details, navigate to the 'client' section. Click the green '+' icon to add a new client. To update existing client information, click the profile icon under the 'Action' column, make the necessary changes, and click 'Submit.' The updated details will be reflected across all relevant sections.

 client ki details add karnay ke liye 'client' section mein jao. New client add karnay ke liye green '+' icon pe click karo. Agar existing client ki info update karni ho to 'Action' column mein profile icon pe click karo, required changes karo aur 'Submit' button dabao. Ye changes har section mein update ho jayein gi.
update_task_status:
To mark a task as completed, add a next task, or view completed tasks, go to the 'Lead' tab. Under the 'Action' column, click the '+' icon. The current task can be marked as completed, and you can add the next task as needed along with any required details. Scroll down to view the full list of previously completed tasks.

 Agar current task ko complete mark karna ho, next task add karna ho ya completed tasks dekhne hoon to 'Lead' tab mein jao. 'Action' column ke neeche '+' icon pe click karo. Wahan current task ko complete mark karo, next task add karo aur zaroori details likho. Neeche scroll karo aur pehle se completed tasks ki puri list dekh saktay ho.
update_lead_client_name:
You cannot update client name. You have to create new lead again.

 Ap client kai name ko update nhi kr saktay. Ap ko new lead banani paray gy.
update_lead_phone:
You cannot change primary number but you can update the secondary number by following this path (client tab->Against entity , click profile icon->Update the secondary number.

Aap primary number change nahi kar saktay, lekin secondary number update kar saktay ho is tarah:client tab mein jao → jis client ka record hai us ke samne profile icon par click karo → aur secondary number update karo.
update_lead_email:
To update client email details, navigate to the 'client' section.To update existing client information, click the profile icon under the 'Action' column, make the necessary changes, and click 'Submit.' The updated details will be reflected across all relevant sections.

 client ki email ki details add/update karnay ke liye 'client' section mein jao. Agar existing client ki info update karni ho to 'Action' column mein profile icon pe click karo, required changes karo aur 'Submit' button dabao. Ye changes har section mein update ho jayein gi.

To update client details, navigate to the 'client' section.To update existing client information, click the profile icon under the 'Action' column, make the necessary changes, and click 'Submit.' The updated details will be reflected across all relevant sections.

 client ki details add/update karnay ke liye 'client' section mein jao. Agar existing client ki info update karni ho to 'Action' column mein profile icon pe click karo, required changes karo aur 'Submit' button dabao. Ye changes har section mein update ho jayein gi.

 client ki details add/update karnay ke liye 'client' section mein jao. Agar existing client ki info update karni ho to 'Action' column mein profile icon pe click karo, required changes karo aur 'Submit' button dabao. Ye changes har section mein update ho jayein gi.
update_lead_currenttask:
To mark a task as completed, add a next task, or view completed tasks, go to the 'Lead' tab. Under the 'Action' column, click the '+' icon. Set the completed task and add the next task as needed, along with any required details. Scroll down to view the list of all completed tasks.

 Agar task complete mark karna ho, next task add karna ho ya completed tasks dekhne hoon to 'Lead' tab mein jao. 'Action' column ke neeche '+' icon pe click karo. Wahan pe complete task set karo, next task add karo aur jo details chahiye wo likho. Neeche scroll karo aur sari completed task list dekh saktay ho.
update_inventory_type:
You can only view lead project details. You cannot update or delete anything init. For adding new details > create new lead for it.

 Aap sirf lead project ki details dekh saktay hain. Aap usmein koi update ya delete nahi kar saktay. Nai details add karne ke liye nayi lead create karni hogi.
update_inventory_subtype:
You can only view lead project details. You cannot update or delete anything init. For adding new details create new lead for it.

 Aap sirf lead project ki details dekh saktay hain. Aap usmein koi update ya delete nahi kar saktay. Nai details add karne ke liye nayi lead create karni hogi.
update_inventory_size:
You can only view lead project details. You cannot update or delete anything init. For adding new details create new lead for it.

 Aap sirf lead project ki details dekh saktay hain. Aap usmein koi update ya delete nahi kar saktay. Nai details add karne ke liye nayi lead create karni hogi.
update_total_price:
To update the total price in the Lead tab, go to the 'Lead' tab and click the Calculator icon under the 'Action' column. The calculator will appear on the left, and the relevant input fields will be on the right. Enter the required details and click 'Submit' to update the total price.

 Total price update karne ke liye 'Lead' tab mein jao, phir 'Action' button ke neeche Calculator icon pe click karo. Left side par calculator nazar ayega aur right side par input fields. Zaroori details bhar ke 'Submit' karo — total price update ho jayegi.
update_payment_mode:
To update the Payment Mode, go to the 'Lead' tab. Under the 'Action' column, click the Calculator icon. In the Payment Mode section, update the necessary fields and click 'Submit' to save the changes.

 Payment Mode update karne ke liye 'Lead' tab mein jao. 'Action' button ke neeche Calculator icon pe click karo. Payment Mode section mein required fields update karo aur 'Submit' pe click karo taake changes save ho jayein.
update_quantity:
To update the Quantity Mode, go to the 'Lead' tab. Under the 'Action' column, click the Calculator icon. In the Quantity Mode section, update the required fields and click 'Submit' to save the changes.

 Quantity Mode update karne ke liye 'Lead' tab mein jao. 'Action' button ke neeche Calculator icon pe click karo. Quantity Mode section mein zaroori fields update karo aur 'Submit' pe click kar do.
update_discount_amount:
To update the Discount amount, go to the 'Lead' tab. Under the 'Action' column, click the Calculator icon. In the 'Pricing Details' section, update the required fields and click 'Submit' to save the changes.

 Discount amount update karne ke liye 'Lead' tab mein jao. 'Action' button ke neeche Calculator icon pe click karo. 'Pricing Details' section mein zaroori fields update karo aur 'Submit' pe click kar do.
update_offered_price:
To update the Offered Price, go to the Lead tab → under the Action button, select the Calculator icon → enter the required details. The Offered Price will automatically update based on the inputs. Then click Submit to save the changes.

 Offered Price update karne ke liye Lead tab mein jao → Action button ke neeche Calculator icon select karo → zaroori details enter karo. Offered Price apne aap update ho jayega. Phir Submit par click karke changes save karo.
update_down_payment:
To update the Down Payment, go to the Lead Tab → against the relevant entry, click the Calculator icon under the Action button → in the Payment Plan section, select Installment → then update your Down Payment %. The remaining fields in that section will update automatically.

 Down Payment update karne ke liye Lead Tab mein jao → jis client ki entry update karni hai, uske Action button ke neeche Calculator icon par click karo → Payment Plan section mein Installment select karo → phir apna Down Payment % update karo. Is se baaki fields automatic update ho jaengi.
update_installments:
To update the Number of Installments, go to the Lead tab → under the Action button, click the Calculator icon → enter the required values in the specified fields → then click Submit to save the changes.

 Number of Installments update karne ke liye Lead tab mein jao → Action button ke neeche Calculator icon select karo → specified fields mein required values daalo → phir Submit par click karo taake changes save ho jaayen.
update_amount_per_installment:
To update the amount per Installments, go to the Lead tab → under the Action button, click the Calculator icon → enter the required values in the specified fields → then click Submit to save the changes.

 Number of Installments update karne ke liye Lead tab mein jao → Action button ke neeche Calculator icon select karo → specified fields mein required values daalo → phir Submit par click karo taake changes save ho jaayen.
update_total_installments:
To update the total of Installments, go to the Lead tab → under the Action button, click the Calculator icon → enter the required values in the specified fields → then click Submit to save the changes.

 Number of Installments update karne ke liye Lead tab mein jao → Action button ke neeche Calculator icon select karo → specified fields mein required values daalo → phir Submit par click karo taake changes save ho jaayen.
update_installment_duration:
To update the Installments Duration, go to the Lead tab → under the Action button, click the Calculator icon → enter the required values in the specified fields → then click Submit to save the changes.

 Number of Installments update karne ke liye Lead tab mein jao → Action button ke neeche Calculator icon select karo → specified fields mein required values daalo → phir Submit par click karo taake changes save ho jaayen.
update_rent_per_month:
To update the Number of rent per month, go to the Lead tab → under the Action button, click the Calculator icon → enter the required values in the specified fields of Pricing Details → then click Submit to save the changes.

 Number of Installments update karne ke liye Lead tab mein jao → Action button ke neeche Calculator icon select karo → specified fields mein required values daalo → phir Submit par click karo taake changes save ho jaayen.
update_project_name_inventory:
To update the project name, go to Dashboard > Inventory >  Click the Action button (Edit icon) next to the desired entry > Update the project details of required columns in the popup > Submit.

Project name update karne ke liye Inventory pr jae >  jis entry ka naam change karna ho uske samne Action button (Edit icon) par click karo > Popup mein project details mein zaroori details update karo > Submit.

Go to Inventory Tab →  Action Column → Click Edit (pencil icon) against the record → Select category (Rent/Sales) → Enter desired Block details → Submit to update.

update_inventory_action_button:
Go to Inventory Tab > the Action column (last column of each entry) provides 3 options — Edit (✏️) to update inventory details, Delete (🗑️) to remove the record, and Assign New Lead (➕) to assign a new lead for that specific inventory entry.

 Inventory Tab> har entry ke last column (Action) mein 3 options hote hain — Edit (✏️) ka use inventory details ko update karne ke liye hota hai, Delete (🗑️) se record delete hota hai, aur Assign New Lead (➕) se us entry ke liye naya lead assign kiya jata hai.
add_lead_from_inventory:
Go to Inventory Tab >  Action Column (Profile Icon) → Click Add New Lead, a popup appears → Search and select client → Below, lead record appears with Assign New Lead or Assign Existing Lead → Click desired option → Fill popup form and Submit.

 Inventory Tab>  Action Column (Profile Icon) pe click karo → Add New Lead ka popup open hoga → client search karo jisko lead assign karni hai → Neeche lead record dikhega jiske sath 2 actions honge: Assign New Lead ya Assign Existing Lead → Jo option chahiye uspe click karo → Naya popup aayega, usme details bhar ke Submit karo.
add_inventory_from_inventory_section:
Go to inventory tab--> Green button (+) on the right side-->click and add required inventory details and submit.

 Inventory tab pe jao → right side pe green button (+) dikh raha hoga → uspe click karo → required inventory details fill karo aur submit karo.
give_client_discount:
Go to the Lead, click on Action > Calculator, then open the Pricing Details section. Enter the amount, review the final deal price, and click Submit to save the changes.

 Lead par jaayein, phir Action > Calculator par click karein. Pricing Details section mein amount enter karein, final price check karein, aur Submit par click karke changes save karein.
edit_inventory_data:
Go to Inventory Tab >  Action Column (Pencil Icon) → Click Edit → Select category (Rent/Sale) → Enter required details in the popup form → Click Submit to update the inventory.

 Inventory Tab>  Action Column (Pencil Icon) pe click karo → Edit ka option choose karo → Category select karo (Rent/Sale) → Jo details update karni hain wo form me bharo → Aur Submit karo taake inventory update ho jaye.
delete_inventory_data:
To protect your data consistency and preserve existing lead associations, inventory deletion is not permitted. This ensures that no historical lead or sales information is lost. However, you can always add new inventory entries as needed.

 Lead data ya purane records disturb na hoon, is wajah se inventory delete karna allowed nahi hai. System mein consistency maintain karne ke liye yeh zaroori hai. Lekin aap nayi inventory asaani se add kar sakte hain.
calculator_usage:
Calculator: To calculate pricing and payment plan for a lead, go to the Lead tab, under Action, click the Calculator icon. Fill in the required fields like price type, amount, payment method (installments or lump sum), and click Submit. This will update the lead with calculated values.

 Inventory assign karne (yaani lead create karne) ke liye 'Inventory' tab mein jao, 'Action' pe click karo, phir profile icon pe click karo. Client search karo, select karo aur assign karo — is se client ke liye ek lead create ho jayegi.Ya phir, left sidebar se 'Lead' tab mein jao, 'Add New Lead' pe click karo, client search karo aur ya to existing lead assign karo ya naye details dekar new lead create karo.
envelope_icon_usage:
To quickly access the email entry linked to the client, go to the Lead tab, click on the Action button, and select the Envelope (Gmail) icon. This will directly open or link to the Gmail address associated with the client's record, allowing you to email them easily.

 Lead tab mein action button ke andar envelope (Gmail) icon pe click karo. Ye client ke Gmail entry ko open karega ya link karega, taake aap asaani se us client ko email bhej sako.
download_icon_usage:
To download a summary of all required fields for a lead, go to the Lead tab, click on the Action button, and select the Download icon. This will generate a PDF file containing all lead-related information (like payment plan, client info, offered price, etc.) and allow you to save or print it.

Lead tab mein action button pe click karo aur download icon select karo. Ye aik PDF file generate karega jisme client ka tamam data hoga (payment plan, offered price waghera), jise aap download ya print kar sakte ho.
tab_location_info: Go to Dashboard → clients → Lead → Inventory → To-Do → Tutorials
tutorials:
Go to the 'Tutorial' tab, click on the desired video, and start watching.

 'Tutorial' tab mein jao, apni desired video pe click karo aur dekhna shuru karo.
greeting:
🤖:Assalamualaikum! Main aapki madad ke liye yahan hoon — please batayein kis cheez mein rehnumai chahiye?

 Hello! I'm here to assist you — please let me know how I can help you today.
inventory_search_by_type_commercial:
To search inventory by COMMERCIAL type, Go to Inventory Tab > Use the 'Type' filter dropdown and select Commercial > Choose subcategory if needed > Click Submit/Search.

Inventory ko commercial type ke mutabiq search karne ke liye Inventory Tab > 'Type' filter dropdown se Commercial select karo > Zarurat ho to subcategory bhi select karo > Submit ya Search par click karo.
inventory_search_by_type_residential:
To search inventory by RESIDENTIAL type, Go to Inventory Tab > Use the 'Type' filter dropdown and select Residential > Choose subcategory if needed > Click Submit/Search.

Inventory ko residential type ke mutabiq search karne ke liye Inventory Tab > 'Type' filter dropdown se Residential select karo > Zarurat ho to subcategory bhi select karo > Submit ya Search par click karo.
download_client_project_details:
To download a summary of all required fields for a lead, go to the Lead tab, click on the Action button, and select the Download icon. This will generate a PDF file containing all lead-related information (like payment plan, client info, offered price, etc.) and allow you to save or print it.

Lead tab mein action button pe click karo aur download icon select karo. Ye aik PDF file generate karega jisme client ka tamam data hoga (payment plan, offered price waghera), jise aap download ya print kar sakte ho.
next_priority_task:
Go to To-do tab--> list of task will appear--> See next task.

 To-do tab pe jao → tasks ki list nazar aayegi → next task dekh lo.
assign_lead_client:
Go to client tab--> infront of eaach client--> Tab( Assign lead) and add details and submit.

 client tab pe jao → har client ke samne Assign Lead tab hoga → uspe click karo, details submit kar do.
update_project_location_inventory_lead:
You cannot update anything in Lead Tab.

 Ap is mai kuch chnage nhi kr saktay.
view_client_email:
Go to client/lead tab--> Search by name-->will see the email of client.

 client/Lead tab mai jao--> Name sae search kro-->client ki email nazar aa jae gy.
view_client_details:
Go to Lead tab--> Search by name--> will see the details of all clients.

 Lead tab mai jao--> Name sae search kro-->client ki sarey details nazar aa jae gy.
view_client_profile:
Go to Lead tab--> Search by name--> will see the details of all clients.

 Lead tab mai jao--> Name sae search kro-->client ki sarey details nazar aa jae gy.
add_next_task:
For this go to the Lead tab. Under the Action button, click the plus (+) icon, fill in the next task requirement, and then submit

 Is kai lyae Lead tab mein jao. Action button ke neeche plus (+) icon par click karo, agla task likho jo zarurat hai, aur submit kar do.
custom_payment_plan_inventory:
Go to inventory tab--> Green button (+) on the right side-->click and add required inventory details and submit.

 Inventory tab pe jao → right side pe green button (+) dikh raha hoga → uspe click karo → required inventory details fill karo aur submit karo.
assign_inventory_to_client:
Go to client Tab > search client > assign new lead. For existing/new lead, go to Inventory Tab > Action > Profile icon > search client > assign lead.

 client Tab mein jao > client search karo > new lead assign karo. Existing ya new lead ke liye Inventory Tab > Action > Profile icon > client search karo > lead assign karo.
client_tab_info:
The Client Tab displays: Sr.No, Name, Primary Number, Secondary Number, Email, CNIC, Gender, Address, Country, City, Type, and Rating. Clients can be searched only by Name. To update a client’s profile (except Name and Primary Number), go to Action > click the Profile icon > edit the required information. You can also assign leads to the client from this section.

 Client Tab mein yeh fields hoti hain: Sr.No, Name, Primary Number, Secondary Number, Email, CNIC, Gender, Address, Country, City, Type, aur Rating. Client ko sirf Name se search kiya ja sakta hai. Agar profile update karni ho (Name aur Primary Number ke ilawa), to Action > Profile icon par click karein aur zaroori maloomat edit karein. Yahan se aap client ko lead bhi assign kar sakte hain.
lead_tab_info:
The Lead Tab displays: Sr.No, Name, Phone Number, Status, Tasks, and project/payment details. The + icon is used to assign or complete current and next tasks. The Calculator icon is used to create a custom payment plan. The Notes icon allows saving internal information. The WhatsApp icon is used to send messages or share details with the client. The Download icon lets you save a PDF. The Envelope icon is used for sending emails. Leads cannot be deleted.

 Lead Tab mein Sr.No, Name, Phone Number, Status, Tasks aur project/payment details hoti hain. + icon se current ya next task assign ya complete kiya ja sakta hai. Calculator icon se custom payment plan banaya ja sakta hai. Notes icon se internal info save ki ja sakti hai. WhatsApp icon se client ko message ya details bheje ja sakte hain. Download icon se PDF save hoti hai. Envelope icon se email bhej sakte hain. Lead delete nahi ki ja sakti.
update_client_pricing:
To update the pricing for a specific client, go to the Lead tab. Against the desired entry, click on it,Under the Action button. Open the Calculator, fill in the required pricing details, and click Submit to save the changes.

 Specific client ki pricing update karne ke liye Lead tab par jaayein. Jo entry update karni hai us par click karein, phir Action button par click karein. Calculator open karein, required pricing details fill karein aur Submit par click karke changes save karein.
update_downpayment:
To update the down payment for a client, go to the Lead tab. Click on the specific entry, then select the Action button. In the Calculator, update the down payment field as needed and click Submit to save the changes.

 Client ki down payment update karne ke liye Lead tab par jaayein. Jo specific entry hai us par click karein, phir Action button select karein. Calculator mein down payment ka field update karein aur Submit par click karke changes save karein.
inventory_tab_info:
Inventory tab lets you view and manage inventory data using filters like City, Type, Project, Lead Status, Custom Price, Area, and Contact Date.
You can search inventory using any of these fields.
Displayed data includes: Sr.No, Project Name, Project City, Project Location, Block, Sector, Phase, Address, Pin Location, Inventory Type, Sub Type, Apartment Type, Available Units, Area, Net Area, Gross Area, Circulations, Total Price, Quantity, Discount %, Discount Amount, Offered Price, Per Unit Price, Per Month Rent.
From the Actions column:
- Click profile icon to assign existing or new lead to a client
- Click pencil icon to edit inventory
- Click bin icon to delete inventory

Inventory tab mein aap filters jaise City, Type, Project, Lead Status, Custom Price, Area aur Contact Date se data search kar sakte hain.
Aap kisi bhi field ke zariye inventory search kar sakte hain.
Yahan yeh fields show hoti hain: Sr.No, Project Name, Project City, Project Location, Block, Sector, Phase, Address, Pin Location, Inventory Type, Sub Type, Apartment Type, Available Units, Area, Net Area, Gross Area, Circulations, Total Price, Quantity, Discount %, Discount Amount, Offered Price, Per Unit Price, Per Month Rent.
Actions column mein:
- Profile icon click karke client ko existing ya new lead assign kar sakte hain
- Pencil icon se inventory edit kar sakte hain
- Bin icon se inventory delete kar sakte hain
todo_tab_purpose:
ToDo tab--> A list of leads with a 'next task' scheduled for today will be displayed.

 Aaj ke liye jo leads ka 'next task' scheduled hai, unki list show hogi.
define_client:
A client is a person who wants to buy, sell, or rent a property.

 Client wo shakhs hota hai jo property kharidna, bechna ya kiraye par lena chahta hai.
goodbye:
Goodbye! Have a great day!

Khuda Hafiz! Apka din acha guzray!
check_current_status:
Client ya lead ka current status check karne ke liye Lead tab par jaayein, client ka naam search karein, aur available tabs mein current status dekh lein.

To check the current status of a client or lead, go to the Lead tab, search the client by name, and view the current status in the available tabs.
update_client_status:
For this go to the Lead tab. Under the Action button, click the plus (+) icon, fill in the next task requirement, and then submit

 client ke sath kaam set karne ke liye Lead tab mein jao. Action button ke neeche plus (+) icon par click karo, agla task likho jo zarurat hai, aur submit kar do.
lead_task_location:
Go to Lead Tab->Under action button ->Click + icon ->Task will appear.

Lead tab par jao → Action button ke neeche → + icon par click karo → task nazar aayenge.
dashboard_overview:
The Dashboard tab provides a quick summary with key numbers such as total clients, inventory count, to-do items, and closed clients. It gives you an overview of what's happening in the system. For detailed information, please check the respective tabs.

 Dashboard tab sirf ek summary screen hai jahan sirf numbers show hotay hain — jaise total clients, inventory, to-do items, aur closed clients. Yeh aapko system ka ek quick overview deta hai. Detail dekhne ke liye aap respective tabs open kar sakte hain.
client_add_options:
client tab mai right side pe green + icon hai. Us pe click karne se do options milte hain: 'Add Individual client' aur 'Add Bulk client'. Agar aap ek client add karna chahte ho to manual form fill karein. Agar multiple clients ek sath add karne hain to file format ke mutabiq CSV upload karein.

 On the client tab, you'll see a green + icon on the right side. Clicking it gives two options: 'Add Individual client' and 'Add Bulk client'. To add one client, fill the form manually. For multiple clients, upload a CSV file in the required format.
update_pc_inventory_lead:
You cannot change this. You have to create the new lead for this.

 ap is ko chnage nhi kr saktay is kai lyae ap ko new lead add krna ho gy.
realtor_email:
Company email addresses are not allowed for registration. Please use your personal email to continue. 

 Company email se registration allowed nahi hai. Barah-e-karam apna personal email use karein.
edit_profile:
Yes, you can. Simply go to the Profile section, update the necessary fields, and click 'Submit.' Your profile will be updated successfully.

 Jee haan, aap kar saktay hain. Bas Profile section mein jaain, required fields update karain aur 'Submit' pe click karain. Aapka profile successfully update ho jayega.
dashboard_total:
The dashboard displays a summary including the total number of leads created, total to-do tasks, total inventory added, and total clients closed.

Dashboard mein summary show hoti hai jisme total leads created, total to-do tasks, total inventory, aur total closed clients ka data hota hai.
closed_clients:
The 'Close Client' feature has been removed to ensure consistent data tracking and lead history. You can manage client progress and status through the Lead tab using task and status updates instead.

 'Close Client' ka feature remove kar diya gaya hai taake data consistency aur lead history ka record barqarar rahe. Ab aap client ka progress aur status Lead tab mein tasks aur status update ke zariye manage kar sakte hain.
search_client_by_name:
Yes, you can search for a client fields by typing their name in the search bar available in the 'Lead' tab or the 'Client' tab. It will display their complete record, including current tasks, lead status, and other related details.

 Jee haan, aap client ki fields ki respective detail 'Lead' tab ya 'Client' tab ke search bar mein likh kar usay search kar saktay hain. Is se unka complete record show hoga, jisme current task, lead status aur doosri details shamil hongi.
assign_task_to_client:
To assign/update a task, go to the 'Lead' tab, click the 'Action' button, and then click the '+' icon. Fill in the task details and click 'Submit.' The task will be assigned to the selected client.

 Task assign ya update karne ke liye 'Lead' tab mein jao, 'Action' button pe click karo, phir '+' icon dabao. Task ke details jaise title, due date waghera fill karo aur 'Submit' pe click karo. Task selected client ko assign ho jayega.
assign_lead_to_client:
To assign inventory (i.e., create a lead), go to the 'Inventory' tab, click the 'Action' button, then the profile icon. Search and select a client, then assign the inventory — this will create a lead for that client.Alternatively, you can also go to the 'Lead' tab from the left sidebar, click 'Add New Lead,' search for the client, and either assign an existing lead or create a new one by entering new details.

  Inventory assign karne (yaani lead create karne) ke liye 'Inventory' tab mein jao, 'Action' pe click karo, phir profile icon pe click karo. Client search karo, select karo aur assign karo — is se client ke liye ek lead create ho jayegi.Ya phir, left sidebar se 'Lead' tab mein jao, 'Add New Lead' pe click karo, client search karo aur ya to existing lead assign karo ya naye details dekar new lead create karo.
send_message_to_client:
To send a message to a specific client, go to the 'Lead' tab. Under the 'Action' column, click the appropriate icon — WhatsApp or Email — depending on your preference. The message will be sent directly to that client.

 Kisi specific client ko message bhejne ke liye 'Lead' tab mein jao. 'Action' column ke neeche WhatsApp ya Email icon pe click karo — jo bhi aap use karna chahtay ho. Message directly us client ko chala jayega.
lead_vs_client_difference:
Client registers for purchase or rent; lead is created when that client is linked with a purchased/rented property and inventory details are stored.

 Client wo hota hai jo property khareedne ya rent karne ke liye register karta hai. Jab client ke sath property (inventory) link hoti hai to lead create hoti hai jisme client aur property dono ka record hota hai.
what_is_lead:
A lead is created when a client is assigned to a specific property (inventory). It contains complete details of both the client and the inventory they are interested in or have initiated a transaction for. Leads help track follow-ups, communication, and project-related tasks, making them essential for managing sales and rental workflows effectively.

 Lead us waqt create hoti hai jab kisi client ko kisi specific property (inventory) se assign kiya jata hai. Isme client aur us inventory ki tamam details hoti hain jisme client interested hota hai ya jisme usne transaction start kiya hota hai. Leads se follow-ups, communication aur project-related tasks track kiye jaate hain, jo sales aur rental process ko manage karne ke liye bohat zaroori hota hai.
edit_client_task:
To edit/update a client's task, go to the Lead tab > click the Action (+) icon > the 'Task for Client' popup will appear. Scroll down, and under the Action section, click Edit, make your updates, and then Submit.

 Client ka task edit ya update karne ke liye Lead tab par jaayein > Action (+) icon par click karein > 'Task for Client' ka popup nazar aayega. Neeche scroll karein, phir Action section mein Edit par click karein, updates karein aur Submit karein.
find_client_leads:
Go to the Lead tab > Under the Name column, each client’s assigned leads are listed. You can view the total leads from there.

 Lead tab par jaayein > Name column ke neeche har client ki assigned leads dikhayi jaati hain. Wahaan se aap total leads dekh sakte hain.
delete_lead:
For data consistency and to preserve the history of client interactions and inventory, leads cannot be deleted from the system. This helps ensure accurate records and proper tracking.

 Client aur inventory ka complete record maintain karne ke liye leads system se delete nahi ki ja sakti. Yeh data ki consistency aur tracking ke liye zaroori hai.
upload_bulk_inventory:
To upload inventory in bulk, please navigate to the Inventory tab, then click on the green ‘+’ icon to add and upload your inventory file.

 Bulk inventory upload karne ke liye Inventory tab par jaayein, phir green ‘+’ icon par click karke apni inventory file upload karein.
what_is_propsel:
PropSel is a smart real estate lead management system designed to make your work easier. It helps you organize, track, and follow up with leads efficiently — whether you’re a realtor or a team leader.With features like client management, lead assignment, inventory handling, and smart reminders — PropSel gives you complete control over your property business in one place.

 PropSel aik smart real estate lead management system hai jo aapka kaam asaan banata hai. Is mein aap asaani se leads ko manage, track, aur follow up kar saktay hain — chahay aap realtor ho ya team leader.Is mein client management, lead assignment, inventory upload aur smart reminders jaise features hain jo aapko apna property ka kaam aik jagah say control karne ki sahulat detay hain.
check_next_task:
To check the next task of a client or lead, go to the Lead tab, click on the Action button, then click the + icon. Scroll down — the Task Log will appear showing the Next Task and any Completed Tasks.

 Client ya lead ka next task dekhne ke liye Lead tab par jaayein, Action button par click karein, phir + icon par click karein. Niche scroll karein — wahan Task Log nazar aayega jahan Next Task aur Completed Tasks dikhte hain.
